ExternalServiceRegistration.schema: {"openapi":"3.0.1","info":{"title":"MinloproSearchAccount","description":""},"paths":{"/services/data/v63.0/search":{"get":{"description":"Find Account record(s) via SOSL query.","operationId":"Search Accounts","parameters":[{"name":"q","in":"query","description":"Valid SOSL query targeting Account object","required":true,"allowEmptyValue":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}}],"responses":{"2XX":{"description":"Found Accounts","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"searchRecords":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"Description":{"type":"string"},"attributes":{"type":"object","properties":{"type":{"type":"string"}}},"Id":{"type":"string"},"Name":{"type":"string"}}}}}}}}}}}}}}
